definition: paperback/plainly packaged/opposite: 精裝|精装[jing1 zhuang1]
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Eight translations were made of it, and there were numerous paperback editions.
sentences.chinese: 它被翻译成八种语言，出版了大量的简装版。

sentences.english: Make your apartment feel like a home by decorating frugally.
sentences.chinese: 你可以自己简装一下公寓使之看起来更有家的感觉。

sentences.english: I know a lot of groups were waiting for the paperback release.
sentences.chinese: 因为我知道很多的阅读小组正在等待简装本的发售。
